Evolution Healthcare Consulting, founded and operated by Susan Childs, FACMPE (Board Certified Fellow of the American College of Medical Practice Executives), has the background and initiative needed for today’s healthcare environment.

Methodology

With over twenty four years experience in healthcare, the patient’s access to the best healthcare remains the vital focus.

Ms. Childs’ approach is centered upon the most important relationship – that between the physician and patient.

Each client is offered a level of expertise that is respectful and considerate towards the physician, staff and patient.

Building Relationships

Ms. Childs’ relationship with each of her clients is ongoing with continued support. She believes that every practice has its own unique and distinctive value that can be recognized by patients, peers, the community, and payers.
